mapper.select:
select id , batch_no , sn , user_id , (select real_name from t_user_info where t_user_info.id=tt.user_id) as real_name , (case when tt.pos_type='MPOS' then 'MPOS' when tt.pos_type='TraditionalPOS' then '传统POS' when tt.pos_type='epos' then '电签POS' end) as pos_type , (select real_name from t_user_info where t_user_info.id=tt.allocate_by) as allocate_by , allocate_date from t_user_pos_batch_allocate tt
tt.pos_type='TraditionalPOS'
tt.pos_type='epos'
and allocate_by in(select id from t_user_info where t_user_info.id=#{map.uid})
AND tt.sn = #{map.sn}
AND tt.allocate_date >= date_format(#{map.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND tt.allocate_date <= date_format(#{map.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
${map.dataScope}

select id , batch_no , sn , user_id , (select real_name from t_user_info where t_user_info.id=tt.user_id) as real_name , (case when tt.pos_type='MPOS' then 'MPOS' when tt.pos_type='TraditionalPOS' then '传统POS' when tt.pos_type='epos' then '电签POS' end) as pos_type , (select real_name from t_user_info where t_user_info.id=tt.allocate_by) as allocate_by , allocate_date from t_user_pos_batch_allocate tt
tt.pos_type='TraditionalPOS'
tt.pos_type='epos'
and allocate_by in(select id from t_user_info where t_user_info.id=#{map.uid})
AND tt.sn = #{map.sn}
AND tt.allocate_date >= date_format(#{map.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND tt.allocate_date <= date_format(#{map.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
${map.dataScope}
